thread.title: WinStar Player Wins Largest Award in Gold Series History

author: PR.com
title: WinStar Player Wins Largest Award in Gold Series History
text:
WinStar Player Wins Largest Award in Gold Series History
Lucky Player Wins $1,058,096.
Oklahoma City, OK, September 02, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Rocket Gaming Systems® is pleased to announce that on August 23, 2015, a lucky player was awarded a Gold Series top progressive prize of $1,058,096 while playing Rocket’s Knights of the Round Table video game. The win occurred at WinStar World Casino and Resort in Thackerville, Oklahoma. This marks the 33rd top progressive prize since the game was introduced in 2009 and the largest award in the history of the Gold Series. In all, the Gold Series has awarded more than one billion dollars in prizes.
The Gold Series Network currently consists of 22 video titles and 24 stepper titles, with new games being released frequently. Located in approximately 100 facilities throughout the country, the Gold Series provides players with unique and entertaining themes along with a wide range of bonus round displays. The Gold Series is the most frequently hit million-dollar progressive in Class II gaming and has become one of the most popular product lines in the Indian gaming industry.
About Rocket Gaming Systems
Rocket Gaming Systems is a recognized trademark of the Miami Tribe of Oklahoma Business Development Authority, an economic business enterprise of the Miami Tribe of Oklahoma. Rocket has been providing linked interactive electronic gaming systems and player stations for more than 15 years. Rocket was among the first and remains a leading Class II manufacturer with the technology to offer wide area progressive prizes and is considered to operate the most technologically advanced Class II system in the market.
About WinStar World Casino and Resort
With more games than any other casino in the world, WinStar World Casino and Resort offers more than 7,800 electronic games, 122 tables games, a 3,500-seat Global Event Center and the nearly 1,400-room WinStar World Casino Hotel. Located just north of the Oklahoma/Texas border along Interstate 35, WinStar World Casino and Resort presents unrivaled gaming action 24 hours a day, seven days a week, world-class entertainers and a wide range of restaurants. For more information visit our website at www.WinStarWorldCasino.com or follow on Facebook at facebook.com/WinStarWorldCasino or twitter.com/#!/WinStarWorld.
